messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Shyrley leaving
messages.msgSnippet: ... Not booked me flights yet but the latest I can leave is Dec 30th. We ve found a rented house back home and will be paying for it from Nov 15th so I can go
messages.messageBody:
SandraDodd@... wrote:

>In a message dated 10/28/03 8:32:26 AM, shyrley@... writes:
>
><< Shyrley who really should be wthinking about tidying and packing cos she
>leaves soon. >>
>
>"Soon" like a month? This is it?
>
>I hope you'll still be on this list when you get settled and will tell us
>stories!
>
>Sandra
>
>
>
>
Not booked me flights yet but the latest I can leave is Dec 30th. We've
found a rented house back home and will be paying for it from Nov 15th
so I can go any time after that. I'm justa bit reluctant to set a final
date cos DH doesn't have his Brit security clearance yet plus I'm still
in two minds about whether to spend Xmas in an empty furnitureless house
without DH in the UK or with him here but flying later in pregnancy.
I wish he'd get that clearance before I left though! They are waiting
for the police report from America to show he's not committed any crime
here. They US is being slooooooooooooow on this. Sigh.
I really don't want to move back, pay for the shipping and then find out
DH doesn't get his clearance. It will then be too late for me to fly
back until after the baby is born then I'd have to get an immigrant visa
which can take 6 months for the babe. Plus work out whether I'd stay in
the UK or return to the US.
Aaaaarrrrrrggggggggghhhhhh
But, fingers crossed it all goes to plan. I will stay on list apart from
that 4 weeks when my computer is on a ship. And I'll certainly tell
stories, after I've entertained all my English friends with stories of
the funny ways of yanks ;-)

Shyrley, getting stressed

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Shyrley leaving
messages.msgSnippet: ... Of *course* she ll be staying on this international list.  At least I hope so. Tia

Of *course* she'll be staying on this international list. <g> At least I

Tia
